briefTitle: Pragmatic Trial Comparing Telehealth Care and Optimized Clinic-Based Care for Uncontrolled High Blood Pressure
officialTitle: Pragmatic Trial Comparing Telehealth Care and Optimized Clinic-Based Care for Uncontrolled High Blood Pressure

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Hypertension diagnosis code in medical record, twice in last 24 months
* Attends study clinic for primary care visit within study period with uncontrolled blood pressure
* Systolic blood pressure \>=150 mm Hg or Diastolic blood pressure \>=95 mm Hg at current visit
* Systolic blood pressure \>=150 mm Hg or Diastolic blood pressure \>=95 mm Hg at most recent previous visit

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* End Stage Kidney Disease
* Patients in hospice care and patients who permanently reside in a nursing home

primary.measure: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure Between Baseline and 12 Months (mm Hg)
primary.description: Change in systolic BP, collected from medical records

secondary.measure: Change in Diastolic BP Between Baseline and 12 Months (mm Hg)
secondary.description: change in diastolic BP, collected from medical records

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Who Reporting Monitoring BP at Least 2 Times Per Week at Six Months Follow-up
secondary.description: Patient report of monitoring BP at least 2 times per week

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Who Report High Level of Satisfaction With Hypertension Care at Six Months.
secondary.description:
Patient rating of 9-10 vs. 0-8 on a scale of 0 (low satisfaction) to 10 (high satisfaction). Developed from a scale used by Green, et al (2008).

Citation: Green BB, Cook AJ, Ralston JD, Fishman PA, Catz SL, Carlson J, Carrell D,Tyll L, Larson EB, Thompson RS. Effectiveness of home blood pressure monitoring, Web communication, and pharmacist care on hypertension control: a randomized controlled trial. JAMA. 2008;299:2857-2867. doi:10.1001/jama.299.24.2857

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Who Are Current Smokers at Twelve Months
secondary.description: Current smoker at 12 months
